question: Assuming today is March 15, 2023, what can we conclude about website traffic trends?

options.A: Website traffic growth has significantly slowed down in 2023 compared to previous years.
options.B: The website experienced a major increase in visitor engagement during 2023.
options.C: Traffic patterns show consistent growth year by year.
options.D: Cannot determine 2023 annual trends from this incomplete data.

explanation: This area chart displays annual website traffic data with 2023 showing only partial-year results (as of March 15, 2023, representing approximately 2.5 months or 21% of the year). The inappropriate aggregation misleadingly compares incomplete 2023 data (720K monthly visitors for 2.5 months) with complete annual data from previous years. While 2023 appears to show a dramatic decline in traffic, this is simply because only the first quarter is included. Website traffic often has seasonal variations, and early-year performance may not be representative of full-year trends.
